name: Expanding cards
description: we will see how we can create an expanding card that displays an expanded view of the card on click.

name: Progress steps
description: Progress steps are great for user experience. You typically find these on signup pages and checkout forms where the user needs to enter data across multiple steps.

name: Rotating navigation
description: with a click event and an arrow function create the effect to open and close the navigation

name: Hidden search
description: If you click on the magnifying glass, the search bar expands. When you click again, it hides

name: Blurry Loading
description: In this challenge you will have a distorted image that will become sharp with the advance of the load

name: Drag N Drop
description: the user selects a virtual object by grabbing it and dragging it to a different location or onto another virtual object.

name: AutoText
description: When the page loads, the automatic typing of the chosen phrase is executed

name: HoverBoard
description: In this challenge we have a board, when we pass the pointer over it, it will change it will mark traces with color

name: Scroll Animation
description: In this challenge we will have boxes that will have an effect when the page is scrolled

name: Form input wave
description: When you select the field to write your email or password, the statement of the field will have a wave effect

name: Dad Jokes
description: We took a compilation of jokes to be played randomly on screen.

name: Sound Board
description: En este reto creamos un tablero conn varios botones que al darle clic suena un sonido diferente.

name: Live User Filter
description: En este reto creamos un filtro donde podremos encontrar a un usuario por su nombre o por su localización, para esto utilizaremos datos de la API Random User Generator .

name: Button Ripple Effect
description: En este reto creamos un botón que al darle clic nos genera un efecto visual

name: Background Slider
description: En este reto creamos un carrusel de imágenes donde la imagen de fondo también cambia.

name: Kinetic Loader
description: With this project we will learn to make a spinner with pure CSS by using frames

name: Netflix Mobile Navigation
description: With this project we will create a menu that will be displayed by touching a button

name: Testimonial Box
description: With this project we want to make a card that shows information from a list of objects

name: Pokedex
description: With this project we will create a list of pokemon cards. The information is extracted from an API

name: Double Click Heart
description: With this project we will create a card that when we double click on the image a heart will come out

name: Event Keycodes
description: With this program we are going to identify by an event, which key is pressed on the keyboard. and the information to the pressed key will be printed on the screen.

name: Mobile Nav Navigation
description: With this program we are going to identify by an event, which icon is pressed on the layout. And the information to the pressed icon in this case an image, will be printed on the layout.

name: Drink Water
description: With this program we are going to identify by an event, how many icons are pressed in the layout. And depending on the quantity, we will fill or empty the main image.

name: Feedback UI Desing
description: With this program we are going to identify by an event, which icon is pressed in the layout, which has 3 emojis to measure satisfaction. And by pressing the send button, it will show which emoji was selected and a successful delivery message.

name: GitHub Profile
description: With this program using input, we are going to ask an a username of github, and when press search, print the basic info of the user, using the github api

name: StickyNavigation
description: With this program using input, we are going to ask an a username of github, and when press search, print the basic info of the user, using the github api

name: StickyNavigation
description: With this program using input, we are going to ask an a username of github, and when press search, print the basic info of the user, using the github api
